ideas.title: Eco-friendly packaging solutions

ideas.title: Sustainable fashion line using recycled materials
ideas.description: Create a fashion line using reclaimed fabrics and materials, promoting ethical manufacturing practices.

ideas.title: Solar-powered water purification systems
ideas.description: Design water purification systems powered by solar energy, making clean water accessible in remote areas.
ideas.application: Non-profit organizations, disaster relief efforts, and communities with limited access to clean water.

ideas.title: Urban gardening kits for small spaces
ideas.description: Offer kits that include everything needed for urban dwellers to start their own gardens in limited spaces.
ideas.application: Home gardening enthusiasts, urban dwellers, and educational programs on sustainability.

ideas.title: Vertical farming solutions
